title: Relates to providing accidental death benefits to domestic partners and the children of domestic
summary: Relates to providing accidental death benefits to domestic partners and the children of domestic partners in the case of certain members; changes the definition of eligible beneficiary to include domestic partners and children of domestic partners of members of certain retirement systems; excludes New York city.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law and the retirement and social security law, in relation to providing accidental death benefits to domestic partners and the children of domestic partners in the case of certain members
